entry.title: Russian Forces Expand Donbas Assault, Take Heavy Losses
entry.content: Moscowâ€™s military units were pushing to encircle two cities in eastern Ukraine as part of an all-out assault, but are losing so many men that continued Ukrainian resistance could force Russia to shift strategies again.

entry.title: Hong Kong Lawyer Uses Her Trials to Keep Memories Alive of China's Tiananmen Massacre
entry.content: Courtrooms are the main venue left for Hong Kong lawyer Chow Hang-tung to keep alive memories of the events of 1989, as the city erases statues and other memorials.
